modelCorrections.rawOutput:
Here is the corrected HTML based on the WCAG 2.1 violation description and the provided example:

*Extracted text from website*: "mdiapp (2006～) LayerPaint (2010～2022) FireAlpaca"
- Incorrect HTML: <html>
- Corrected HTML: <html lang="en">

The lang attribute has been added to the <html> element with the value "en" to specify the language of the document as English. This helps assistive technologies like screen readers interpret and pronounce the content correctly for users.
